subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
Left-Handedness
Right-Handedness
lead_paragraph: The switch-pitcher and Yankees minor leaguer Pat Venditte has been a hit in Class A, but scouts have seen little evidence that his singular talents are fit for higher levels.
snippet: The switch-pitcher and Yankees minor leaguer Pat Venditte has been a hit in Class A, but scouts have seen little evidence that his singular talents are fit for higher levels.
